Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.rendering.ansi

Record Class GraphicalRendition

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.rendering.ansi.GraphicalRendition
Record Components:
weight - The weight of the text.
italics - Whether the text is in italics.
underline - Whether the text is underlined.
foreground - The foreground color of the text.
background - The background color of the text.
public record GraphicalRendition(GraphicalRenditionProperty.Weight weight, GraphicalRenditionProperty.Italics italics, GraphicalRenditionProperty.Underline underline, GraphicalRenditionProperty.ForegroundColor foreground, GraphicalRenditionProperty.BackgroundColor background) extends Record
Represents the set of all graphical rendition properties.
